summary.body: We've inherited a beige carpet which has got some nasty black streaks - they're at right angles to the carpet edges, several inches long, and an inch or two apart.  Does anyone know what causes this, and how to remove (or preferably prevent) it?  Hoovering & shampooing make no difference. We want to replace the carpet, but don't want the new one to suffer the same fate. Thanks to anyone who can advise.
summary.subject: black streaks on carpet

summary.body: Hi, can anyone recommend a good carpet cleaner please? I have a flyer for Martyn Everett (if you've used his services, let me know please if he was any good/ how much he charges!) but I usually like to get a couple of quotes. Any advice about carpet dry cleaning generally - it sounds better, but is it smelly?
summary.subject: Carpet cleaner rec please

summary.body: has anyone had any success in cleaning up the concrete around their balcony area ....especially the tower block balcony concrete bit. those of you who live in the towers hopefully will know what i mean :..any ideas warmly received
summary.subject: cleaning  concrete on the inside of the balcony area

summary.body: Anyone used a good carpet cleaning service (steam or pref dry cleaning)  lately please? Or had a good experience with DIY hire cleaner?
summary.subject: carpet cleaning wanted

summary.body: I am refurbishing at the moment and I wondered if anyone knew how to clean up the original Barbican light switches and sockets.
summary.subject: Light switches

summary.body: Any idea what happened to Houseproud Cleaning Company and its owner Lisa?  They cleaned for me on a periodic basis for 10 years, the Barbican being our second home. She seems to have disappeared since the start of the year. I am not impressed by one of the local "big" cleaning companies (name on request) who just charged me 198 Pounds to clean 1100 sq. ft, then forgot to do the laundry as promised and subsequently sent me a bill for the congestion charge and parking (1 hr.) !!![size=18][/size]
summary.subject: Missing Cleaner?

summary.body: I need some advice on how to clean the plughole in the Bathroom Basin. My plug does not full remove and I have tried an old toothbrush and a bottle brush to try and clean it but because of the tight fit and angles I am unsuccessful. I now find that the water is not draining quickly because of the blockage. Please advise on what I can do.
summary.subject: Cleaning the plug in Bathroom

summary.body: Hi, I've recently moved into Andrewes House, and there's often a nasty smell around the kitchen - almost like someone's old Sunday Roast. I've thoroughly drenched my kitchen sink in bleach, so I don't think it can be coming from there. There is a large metal contraption above the electric hobs - like an air vent - and that is encrusted in slimey dust. It seems an original part, and is solid steel - I cannot find a way of taking it apart. Can anyone else share their experience of this kitchen air vent - how to go around cleaning it - or have you had it ripped out or boarded up? Thanks Paul.
summary.subject: Smells from Air Vent above Kitchen hobs
